short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a QR code of the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension is a QR code generator that allows users to generate a QR code of the current webpage they are on. Once installed, the extension will appear as a button in the browser toolbar. Clicking on the button will open a popup window where the user can simply click on a button. The extension relies on an external API found at https://api.qrserver.com/ to generate the QR code. This is the perfect solution to switch from desktop to mobile. No need for typing the URL or emailing a link to yourself!
